DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the present study is to evaluate test-retest reliability of a standard protocol on the Biodex dynamometer in older adults. In addition, the test-retest reliability and validity of an experimental measure of knee extension strength will be assessed in older adults.
DOC.brief_title: Test-retest Reliability of a Standard Protocol on the Biodex Dynamometer
DOC.criteria: +65 years old able to perform a maximal strength test on a dynamometer pathologies that prohibit a maximal strength test on a dynamometer
